

#!/usr/bin/env python

# auto-generated code from Cobot Suite

from festo_cobot_python_libs.cobotv1 import *

 

robot = Cobot("Program.py")

# Group: New Program

# Start Programm

robot.send_app_progress(1, "New Program")

# Point: POINT_3

robot.joint_point([-0.972759544849396, 0.842011630535126, 0.525173485279083, -0.459920525550842, -0.311721533536911, -0.23040871322155, -1.61112463474274], 3)

# Movement: MOVEMENT_2

robot.move(1, 2)

# If: CONDITION_4

if (robot.get_sensor_value("Cobot button ^") == 0):

    robot.send_app_progress(4, "CONDITION_4")

    # Point: POINT_8

    robot.joint_point([-0.45693451166153, 0.846364200115204, 0.527738392353058, -0.464820146560669, -0.311230331659317, -0.23233450949192, -1.60969400405884], 8)

    # Movement: MOVEMENT_7

    robot.move(1, 7)

# Group: ELSE_BRANCH

else:

    robot.send_app_progress(6, "ELSE_BRANCH")

    # Point: POINT_10

    robot.joint_point([-1.48576176166534, 0.831790685653687, 0.523841917514801, -0.443036943674088, -0.31352910399437, -0.220870584249496, -1.60924172401428], 10)

    # Movement: MOVEMENT_9

    robot.move(1, 9)

robot.terminate()
